messages.title: Building a stronger economy and a fairer society.
messages.content: Creating opportunity for everyone. Adrian Walker-Smith and the Liberal Democrats will: cut taxes for 24m workers, ensure an extra £2.5bn for struggling school kids, create a record rise in apprenticeships.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Cut taxes for 24m workers, investing in education, apprenticeships, and balancing the budget responsibly.
Invest an extra £2.5bn for struggling school kids to ensure a fair start for every child.
£8 billion a year extra for the NHS, to secure health service investments, and to ensure mental health is treated the same as physical health.

issues.economy: Cut taxes for 24m workers, balance budget responsibly.
issues.education: Invest an extra £2.5bn for struggling school kids.
issues.health: £8 billion a year extra for the NHS, emphasising the importance of mental health being treated the same as physical health.

images.caption: Adrian Walker-Smith with constituents and engaging in community work.
